10.text: No. LAD-NRO/GN/2011-12/29/36772─In exercise of the powers conferred by section 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India Act, 1992 (15 of 1992) the Securities and Exchange Board of India hereby makes the following regulations, namely: -

113.text: Functions and obligations of the KRA
nounChunks: Functions and obligations of the KRA

114.text: 15. The KRA has the following functions and obligations –

115.text: (a)KRA may prepare the Operating Instructions in co-ordination with other KRA(s) and issue the same to implement the requirements of these regulations.

116.text: (b)KRA(s) shall have electronic connectivity and with other KRA(s) in order to establish inter- operability among KRAs.
nounChunks: order to establish inter- operability among KRAs

117.text: Explanation: Inter-operability means the ability of the KRA to determine whether the KYC documents of the client are in the custody of another KRA.
nounChunks: the KYC documents of the client
the ability of the KRA to determine whether the KYC documents of the client are in the custody of another KRA

118.text: (c)KRA shall have a secure data transmission link with other KRA(s) and with each intermediary that uploads the KYC documents on its system and relies upon its data.
nounChunks: a secure data transmission link with other KRA(s
each intermediary that uploads the KYC documents on its system and relies upon its data

119.text: (d)KRA shall be responsible for storing, safeguarding and retrieving the KYC documents and submit to the Board or any other statutory authority as and when required.
nounChunks: the Board or any other statutory authority

120.text: (e)KRA shall retain the 12[] KYC documents of the client, in 13[] electronic form for the period specified by Rules, as well as ensuring that retrieval of KYC information is facilitated within stipulated time period.
nounChunks: the 12[] KYC documents of the client
13[] electronic form for the period specified by Rules, as well as ensuring that retrieval of KYC information is facilitated within stipulated time period

121.text: (f)Any information updated about a client shall be disseminated by KRA to all intermediaries that avail of the services of the KRA in respect of that client.
nounChunks: all intermediaries that avail of the services of the KRA in respect of that client

122.text: (g)KRA shall ensure that the integrity of the automatic data processing systems for electronic records is maintained at all times.
nounChunks: the integrity of the automatic data processing systems for electronic records
the automatic data processing systems for electronic records

123.text: (h)KRA shall take all precautions necessary to ensure that the KYC documents/records are not lost, destroyed or tampered with and that sufficient back up of electronic records is available at all times at a different place.

300.text: The application fee referred to in Part A shall be paid at the time of filing application. The registration fee referred to in Part A shall be paid by the KRA within fifteen days from the date of receipt of intimation from the Board. The Annual fee shall be paid within 30 days of the end of the financial year.

306.text: 1.A KRA shall make all efforts to protect the interest of its clients.
nounChunks: all efforts to protect the interest of its clients

307.text: 2.A KRA shall maintain high standards of integrity, dignity and fairness in the conduct of its business.
nounChunks: high standards of integrity, dignity and fairness in the conduct of its business

308.text: 3.A KRA shall fulfill its obligations in a prompt, ethical and professional manner.
nounChunks: a prompt, ethical and professional manner

309.text: 4.A KRA shall at all times exercise due diligence, ensure proper care and exercise independent professional judgment.

312.text: 5.A KRA shall ensure that any change in registration status/any penal action taken by Board or any material change in financial position which may adversely affect the interests of clients is promptly displayed on its website.
nounChunks: any penal action taken by Board or any material change in financial position which may adversely affect the interests of clients
any change in registration status/any penal action taken by Board or any material change in financial position which may adversely affect the interests of clients
Board or any material change in financial position
any material change in financial position

313.text: 6.A KRA shall not divulge to anybody either orally or in writing, directly or indirectly, any confidential information about the clients which has come to its knowledge, without taking prior permission of its clients, except where such disclosures are required to be made in compliance with any law for the time being in force.
nounChunks: any confidential information about the clients which has come to its knowledge, without taking prior permission of its clients, except where such disclosures are required to be made in compliance with any law for the time being in force
the clients which has come to its knowledge

314.text: 7.A KRA shall not indulge in any unfair competition.

315.text: 8.A KRA shall display on its website adequate and appropriate information about its business, including contact details of persons and services available to clients.
nounChunks: contact details of persons and services available to clients
persons and services available to clients
adequate and appropriate information about its business, including contact details of persons and services available to clients

316.text: 9.A KRA shall ensure that grievances of clients are redressed in a timely and appropriate manner;

317.text: 10.A KRA shall make reasonable efforts to avoid misrepresentation and ensure that the information provided to the clients and intermediaries is not misleading.
nounChunks: reasonable efforts to avoid misrepresentation and ensure that the information provided to the clients and intermediaries

318.text: 11.A KRA shall abide by the provisions of the Act and the rules, regulations issued by the Government and the Board, from time to time, as may be applicable.
nounChunks: the provisions of the Act and the rules
regulations issued by the Government and the Board

319.text: 12.A KRA shall not make untrue statement or suppress any material fact in any documents, reports, papers or information furnished to the Board.
nounChunks: reports, papers or information furnished to the Board

320.text: 13.A KRA shall ensure that the Board is promptly informed about any action, legal proceeding, etc., initiated against it in respect of any material breach or non-compliance by it, of any law, rules, regulations and directions of the Board or of any other regulatory body.
nounChunks: respect of any material breach or non-compliance

321.text: 14.(a) A KRA or any of his employees shall not render, directly or indirectly, any investment advice about any security in the publicly accessible media.
nounChunks: A KRA or any of his employees
any security in the publicly accessible media
any investment advice about any security in the publicly accessible media

322.text: (b)A KRA shall not make a recommendation to any client who might be expected to rely thereon to acquire, dispose of or retain any securities.
nounChunks: a recommendation to any client who might be expected to rely thereon to acquire, dispose of or retain any securities
any client who might be expected to rely thereon to acquire, dispose of or retain any securities

323.text: 15.A KRA shall ensure that any person it employs or appoints to conduct business is fit and proper and otherwise qualified to act, in the capacity so employed or appointed including having relevant professional training or experience.
nounChunks: any person it employs or appoints to conduct business

324.text: 16.A KRA shall have internal control procedures and financial and operational capabilities which can be reasonably expected to protect its operations, its clients from financial loss arising from theft, fraud, and other dishonest acts, professional misconduct or omissions.
nounChunks: fraud, and other dishonest acts, professional misconduct or omissions

326.text: 18.A KRA shall provide adequate freedom and powers to its compliance officer for the effective discharge of its duties.

327.text: 19.A KRA shall ensure that the senior management, particularly decision makers have access to all relevant information about the business on a timely basis.

328.text: 20.A KRA shall ensure that good corporate policies and corporate governance are in place.

329.text: 21.A KRA should have adequately trained staff and arrangements to render fair, prompt and competence services to its clients.

330.text: 22.A KRA shall develop its own internal code of conduct for governing its internal operations and laying down its standards of appropriate conduct for its employees and officers in the carrying out of their duties. Such a code may extend to the maintenance of professional excellence and standards, integrity, confidentiality, objectivity, avoidance of conflict of interests, disclosure of shareholdings and interests, etc.

334.text: (c)passing of unpublished price sensitive information in respect of securities which are listed and proposed to be listed in any stock exchange to any person or intermediary.

336.text: 25.A KRA shall follow maker-checker concept in its activities to ensure accuracy of data.
